graph.topic: Influence of English - advantages outweigh the disadvantages

nodes.text: communication between countries and cultures become convenient
In my country, English is a required course from elementary school
studying abroad is easy and becomes hot among youngsters
For them, language obstacle is no longer a problem, which results in mutual understanding and trust between their mother land and the host country
This, in turn, enhances relationship and promotes international business
researchers, especially those who work on high-tech, would have wider range of references if they are good at English
Taking IT industry for an example, top technical science is published in English
It's neither to get a translated version of these articles, nor to always have a translator besides
they have no choice but choosing English as a second language
English is making lesser-known languages disappear ever year
the culture heritage and nation identity vanish
this is really short-sighted, ignoring the rapid development of native economy and society
the prevalent usage of English brings benefits to people and countries all around
all youths should learn English owing to its key role in globalization
actions, like recording, can be taken to protect native languages and cultures
